reports.title: name="Kingdom Come: Deliverance" appid="379430" target_framerate="40-49 FPS title="45FPS experience with high textures"

data.game_display_settings:
#### Graphic Settings
- **Resolution:** 1280x800
- **Window mode:** Fullscreen
- **Overall image quality:** Custom
- **Show FPS:** Off
- **VSync:** On
- **Vertical FOV:** 60
data.game_graphics_settings:
#### Advanced Graphics Settings
- **Antialiasing:** SMAA 1TX
- **Object quality:** Medium
- **Game effects:** Medium
- **Lighting:** Medium
- **Particles:** Medium
- **Physics:** Medium
- **Postprocess quality:** Medium
- **Shader quality:** Medium
- **Shadows:** Medium
- **Textures:** High
- **Water details:** Medium
- **Volumetric effects detail:** Medium
- **Vegetation detail:** Medium
- **Object distance:** 6 ticks
- **LOD distance:** 4 ticks
- **Vegetation draw distance:** 3 ticks
- **Motion Blur:** Off
data.additional_notes: Looks awesome with the provided settings maintaining a solid 45 FPS in the starting area and during combat. Performance may change later on in which these settings can be turned down to improve performance as they focused on visual fidelity.
